xml.data:
Home » 17A11 Ekādasakanipātapāḷi » 1 Paṭhamapaṇṇāsaka » 1.3 Sāmaññavagga
1.3.481--960
Paṭhamapaṇṇāsaka
Sāmaññavagga
502.
224Ekādasahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgato gopālako bhabbo gogaṇaṃ pariharituṃ phātikātuṃ. Katamehi ekādasahi? Idha, bhikkhave, gopālako rūpaññū hoti…pe… .
225Evameva kho, bhikkhave, ekādasahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu bhabbo cakkhusmiṃ aniccānupassī viharituṃ…pe…  paṭinissaggānupassī viharitunti.
<< 1.3.433--480 up1.4 Rāgapeyyāla >>
